--- Comment #1 from Benjamin Tyner (<mailto:btyner@gmail.com|btyner@gmail.com>) ---
Tried the example under R 4.5.0 and the result differs slightly from before; at
the point of:

> install.packages("abc", lib = templib)

it now directly gives

  Error: package 'SparseM' required by 'quantreg' could not be found
  Execution halted
  ERROR: lazy loading failed for package 'abc'

For what that's worth...
